plugin.name: Sync Todoist and Noteplan
plugin.description: Sync tasks between todoist and noteplan
plugin.author: Daniel Bludeau

plugin.settings.title: Todoist API token
plugin.settings.description: API token for your Todoist account.  See https://todoist.com/help/articles/find-your-api-token for more information.

plugin.settings.title: Folder to use for syncing
plugin.settings.description: OPTIONAL. Folder where Todoist projects will sync to notes of same name.  If omitted, plugin will look for a folder named Todoist and create it if it does not exist
